blogDesc: I started writing articles in December 2020, mainly for software sharing and skills sharing. In total, I have written {{count}} articles on my blog. You can search by title in the search bar below.

Seo.dashboardDesc: This is my personal dashboard, built with Next.js API routes deployed as serverless functions. I use this dashboard to track various metrics across platforms like YouTube, GitHub, and more.
Seo.guestbookDesc: Sign my guestbook and share your idea.

Guestbook.tip: Your information is only used to display your name and avatar

404.title: You have found a secret place
404.description: Unfortunately, this is only a 404 page. You may have mistyped the address, or the page has been moved to another URL.
404.button: Take me back to home page

500.title: Something bad just happened...
500.description: Our servers could not handle your request. Don't worry, our development team was already notified. Try refreshing the page.

game.title: Marble Guest
game.howDesc: Guessing gundu is a traditional game from Indonesia, usually played by 2 or more people. Each player bets gundu according to their will, and then each player will guess the total of all the gundu that are bet, including their own betting gundu. The winner is determined from the correct guess. The winner will get all the gundu that are bet.

about.title: Something bad just happened...
about.p1: Technology and computers have always fascinated me. I find myself constantly exploring new advancements in the field and seeking out opportunities to learn more. As a programmer, I am particularly drawn to coding and building new things from scratch. The process of turning lines of code into a tangible product never ceases to amaze me.
about.p2: My passion for technology has led me to pursue a career in the field. I am determined to make a meaningful impact by leveraging my skills to develop innovative solutions that make a positive difference in people's lives. My enthusiasm for the subject drives me to stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in the industry.
about.p3: Through my work and personal projects, I have come to appreciate the power and creativity that technology offers. It allows us to solve complex problems, automate mundane tasks, and connect people from all around the world. I find joy in problem-solving and using my coding skills to develop practical solutions that benefit society.
about.p4: I am grateful for the opportunities that technology has provided me and the community at large. It has enabled me to explore new ideas, connect with like-minded individuals, and create amazing things. I am excited about the future of technology and am determined to make a meaningful contribution to its advancement.

hero.p1: Crafting Web Apps with Modern Frontend Technologies
